/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are predominantly beige and white, punctuated by occasional red and green accents that add a touch of color to the urban landscape. The street itself is a hive of activity, filled with cars and buses navigating their way through the city's arteries. Pedestrians can be seen as well, adding a human element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a serene backdrop to the busy street scene below.
